ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.adapters
Class CustomLocationAdapter

java.lang.Object
  android.widget.BaseAdapter
      ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.adapters.CustomLocationAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
public class CustomLocationAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter

Adapter to display a list of locations the user posted from in the past. Each list item consists of a point of interest that was obtain for the location on post.

Author:
Artem Chikin
